hosting-landing.mainfeature_title: All you need to grow online.
hosting-landing.mainfeature_descitem1: A perfect domain name allows you to present your brand in the best light.
hosting-landing.mainfeature_descitem2: Our powerful, reliable web hosting backs your site on a stable & secure platform.
hosting-landing.mainfeature_descitem3: 24/7/365 Premium Support via Phone, Live Chat and Online Support Portal.
hosting-landing.morefeature_desc1: With industry-leading load times, guaranteed 99.9% uptime and expert 24/7 support, your site couldn’t ask for more.
hosting-landing.morefeature_desc2: Deploy to any of our data center locations – New York, SF, London, Amsterdam, Bangalore, and more.
hosting-landing.morefeature_desc3: View summary stats and time series graphs of resource usage for your Kubernetes cluster, database, or individual Droplet nodes.
